name: A Knight Slayin Dragons - Castle Fire War
name_original: A Knight Slayin Dragons - Castle Fire War
description:
A Knight Slayin Dragons is a retro style fantasy game. Collect all of the Knights and
slay as many Dragons as you can in this epic adventure. Run through the castle
to fight the oncoming fleet of evil Dragons before the Kingdom is destroyed.

The action is intense as the Hero Knights are called upon to kill a swarm of Dragons by the King.

>Simple tap gameplay
>Collect all 4 Knights
>Run and shoot
>Retro Pixel Graphics
